poson pura pasaloswaka pohoya nimiththen lekhawus aayathanaya panas dewani waratath sanwidhana karana mihinthala aaloka pujawa janadhipathi mahinda rajapaksha mahathage surathin eeye (11) paswaruwe wiwrutha kerini.mihinthalaya raja maha wiharadhipathi, gaurawa shasthrawedi walawahangunawawe dhammarathana nahimiyange anushasakathwayen simasahitha eksath prawruththi pathra samagame sabhapathi jyeshta madhyawedi bandula padmakumara mahathage mangapenwimen sanwidhana kerena mema mahangu pinkame aalokaya wiwrutha karannata janadhipathiwaraya sapath wu dewani wasara meya we.anubudu mihindu maha rahathan wahanse lakdiwata budu dahama wadama karawu mihinthala puda bima widuli aalokayen eliya karawana mihinthala aaloka pujawata abans aayathanaya bathibara dayakathwaya saha lanka widulibala mandalaya sama anugrahakathwaya dakwayi.mihinthala aaloka pujawa wiwrutha karannata janadhipathithuma eeye sawasa 6.30ta pamana mihinthala puda bima wetha sapath wiya.

eeta amatharawa merata sanhindiyawa saha wagawime kriyawaliya sambandhayen maha brithanya ha jarmaniya athulu ratawal 5ka anugrahaya athiwa sakas kala 30/01 yojanawata adala karunu thawaduratath kriyathmaka kirima sandaha wasara dekaka kalayak dirghakara ganima sambandhayen wana yojanawa elambaena (21) da idiripath kirimata niyamithawa thibe. 2015 okthobar ha 2017 marthu masaye idiripath kala yojana mangin shri lankawa ekanga wu karunu kriyathmaka kirimata diriganwana bawata mema yojanawe sandahankara thibena athara athurudanwuwan pilibanda karyala pihituwima, hamudawa uthure athpath karagena thibu siwil janathawage idam yali owun wetha labadimata katayuthu kirima aadi karunu ema yojanawen pasasumata lakkara atha.

harsha sugathadasa chaya: pinsiri aariyarathna ali natum nawathwima narambaannan- sewaka mahathun saha anek ali athun kshaya rogayen beraganimata kala deyak jathika sathwodyanaye ali kihipa denekuge kshaya roga prathideha handuna ganima aashrithawa pashu waidyawarunta athi wi athi tharjana sambandhawa ehi lekam waidya si.ji. wijesinha saha sabhapathi waidya bi.ee.di.es. jayawardhana yana mahathunge athsanin madhya niwedanayak nikuth kara atha.dehiwala jathika sathwodyanaye ali atharin kihipa denekuta kshaya roga thaththwayata adala prathideha athi bawa parikshanawalin pasugiyada handuna gena atha.

fesbuk himikarithwaya yatathe instargram keti kalak thula wishala diyunuwak labuweya. 2013 wasare di instargram 23%ka diyunuwak athpath kara gaththe ehi himikarithwaya darana fesbuk 3%ka wardhanayak himi kara ganna wita wima suwisheshi karunaki. 2014 wasara awasana wana wita instargram miliyana 300ka parishilakayan pramanayakata himikam kiweya.
